lead_paragraph: Police arrested ten people suspected of operating a network providing European passports to Al Qaeda-linked groups.
snippet: Police arrested ten people suspected of operating a network providing European passports to Al Qaeda-linked groups.

headline.main: Police in Spain and Thailand Arrest 10 in Qaeda-Linked Ring
headline.seo: Terror-Linked Arrests in Spain and Thailand
headline.print_headline: Police in Spain and Thailand Arrest 10 in Qaeda-Linked Ring

byline.original: By RAPHAEL MINDER and J. DAVID GOODMAN
byline.contributor: Raphael Minder reported from Madrid, and J. David Goodman from New York. Souad Mekhennet contributed reporting from Frankfurt, and Eric Schmitt from Washington.
